text: @realDonaldTrump Trump is such a pathetic figure. Virtually every country dealing with COVID-19 has gone on lockdown or extensive social distancing for minimum 2-3 weeks to slow the spread. Less than a week into it, Trump wants us to resume normal & let the epidemic spread for political gain.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
